1370: Wlfarde was born in St. Joris straet in 1370.
1372: Lost mother at the age of 2 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 2.
Wein took care of Wlfarde since Wlfarde was 3.
1374: Lost sibling Walic in 1374 when Walic was 4.
1388: Got married to Natelien at age 19 in 1388.
Wlfarde moved to Walker straet.A.4 after marriage.
1390: Lost father at the age of 20.
1394: Had a daughter with Natelien, Natelien, at age 24.
1395: Lost his wife Natelien while she was giving birth to Walburgis in 1395.

1398: Got married a second time to Nimme at age 29 in 1398.
Wlfarde moved to Walker straet.B.0 after marriage.
Became caretaker of Winrechus, Strom at age 29.
Moved in with wife Nimme after marriage.
1399: Lost his wife Nimme while she was giving birth to Ancelmus in 1399.
